lead_paragraph: The 3i Group's chief, Michael Queen, believes that a bubble is developing in the market for secondary buyouts, an inflation similar to the technology bubble before the dot-com crash.
snippet: 3i's chief, Michael Queen, believes that a bubble is developing in the market for secondary buyouts similar to the tech bubble before the dot-com crash.

headline.main: 3i Chief Sees Bubble in Buyout Market
